name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[It turns out that even the Chinese Academy of Sciences has to illegally bypass the firewall]
On October 3, the Institute of Physics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences on Bilibili broadcast the Nobel Prize in Physics award ceremony, and the VPN software Clash (VPN) appeared below.
It makes people sigh that even the highest academic institution in China's science and technology has to use illegal VPN means.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 3, an accidental suffocation incident occurred in Xingping Village, Doucun Town, Wutai County, Xinzhou City, Shanxi Province, killing 7 people. It was initially determined to be caused by carbon monoxide poisoning.
At around 7 o'clock that evening, Shan Moumou entered the feed pit of the drying equipment of Hongyuan Processing Plant and lost contact. Then 6 people entered the tunnel to rescue and were poisoned one after another.
This processing plant is mainly engaged in corn threshing and drying and then selling. The factory has been in a state of suspension this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 4, the British Times and Daily Mail reported that on August 21, a Chinese submarine had an accident while performing a mission in the Yellow Sea, resulting in the death of 55 crew members. 
This news has been circulating in the Chinese Twitter circle for a long time, but was denied by Beijing and Taiwan.

content: According to the Russian Satellite News Agency, Russia plans to block VPN services in its country starting March next year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the National Day approaches, high school students across the country have launched protests to defend their holidays. 
Since the Hengshui model has been rolled out nationwide and extended to lower grades, too many students have jumped off buildings or committed suicide due to academic pressure. 
The eight-day holiday during the Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day should have been a chance for students to rest and breathe, but schools across the country have been forced to start school early in order to increase the enrollment rate. 
Therefore, students risked being expelled and being accused of foreign forces and announced that they would defend their holidays to the death. 
Because for today's Chinese high school students, jumping off buildings or protesting has become a problem. 
Chinese high school students' holiday defense movement [Teacher Li is not your teacher]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 4, at Xiaoyiwu Shopping Mall in Zhangqiu, Jinan, an old man put up a banner to "seek justice for the President of the country". He said that in 2018, the eyes of President Xi's photo were removed on a propaganda board in Bijie, Guizhou, and the local government did nothing and deliberately concealed it, so he had to seek justice.

content:
Passing on the torch
For two months, the battle of attack and defense of this video about Zhengzhou Design Institute's leave is still going on on Bilibili. It is still being deleted and re-uploaded by netizens, and the watermark has been superimposed countless times.
Now, this video has been called "Electronic Holy Flame" by netizens
